    • Constructor Detail

      • OperationImpl

        public OperationImpl(Updates op,
             int fieldNo,
             Tuple args)
        Creates update operation
        Parameters:
        op - Update operation Updates
        fieldNo - Number of field to execute update. Remember that Tarantool supports only 3 data types: integer, long and byte[]. So arithmetic operations can only be executed on integer and long elements.
        args - Operation arguments. usually there should be 1 argument, but SPLICE has 3
